comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: My first thought was "George Foster Peabody" of the Peabody Awards, but he would have been about 60 in 1913, and this guy looks about 30. I don't remember Peabody having any children.

comment.author: 11572312@N00
comment._content: Here is Wikipedia article on one Peabody (born in 1852): en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Foster_Peabody

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content:
From some NYT exploration, I discovered:

George F. Peabody of Appleton, Wisconsin was Secretary of the American Fisheries Society.

George F Peabody of Lake George, NY was a member of the Federal Reserve Board in 1914 

Neither of these seem to be the George Foster Peabody above.
